materialTestRequest.description: 24 bobbins of CARLTON 100's tipping on Ecusta's #30134-12-001 34 grams/M. Shamrock Gravure as a potential supplier. New York Purchasing will issue a purchase order for the bobbins to be delivered in May. This Mrr will also facilitate the initial trial of Ecusta's base stock which is claimed to be equivalent to Schweitzer's GsR 156-HD.

testResults.recommendation: recommend another 25 to 40 bobbin test with pressure drop target of 1.0 + 4-8

note: PERPETUAL FILE. WHERE REQUIRED, MAKE XEROX FOR LOCAL FILES.
